concept.title: Add to PassBook
concept.shortdesc: When using Mac OS X, iOS 6 or later devices with an enabled iCloud account, the system will generate an eTicket that can be used for event check-in. The Passbook feature is only available to users registering for Conference style events.

conbody.p: The Add to Passbook feature is automatically enabled for all Mac OSx users and iOS 6 or later devices. The system generates a QR code from the event information and produces an eTicket for the purchaser to download to their iOS device. The Add to Passbook feature stores the eTicket on the Attendee record. The system ensures the eTicket cannot be used multiple times.

The Add to Passbook feature is used for ticket types and the configuration of the eTicket cannot be altered. However, staff users can alter the color for the fonts and values on the related Event record:
The ETicket Label Color controls the font color of the label
The ETicket Value Color controls the color of the field value
